PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2016-00272016-01-26,  ,  ,  ,  AAFC, 
ActFarm Income Protection Act
SubjectContributions to assist Tree fruit (apple and pear) producers in Nova Scotia
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Agriculture and Agri-Food to provide for FEDERAL CONTRIBUTIONS OF UP TO $1,690,000 TO ASSIST TREE FRUIT (APPLE AND PEAR) PRODUCERS in NOVA SCOTIA who are faced with the extraordinary costs resulting from the implementation of a strategy led by the tree fruit producersâ€™ industry to combat an outbreak of fire blight and to reduce the disease to manageable levels.
